attributes.action: Not to install bugging probes in telephone systems and computer networks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We petition the government to not use 'bugging probes' to spy on each and every person in the UK but only to use this facility for those actually posing a threat.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
